title: Manage a Last-Minute Gate Change
description: Due to an operational issue, a flight's departure gate has been changed 45 minutes before departure. A gate agent must manage the change.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the gate change notification from operations control.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the new gate assignment.

tasks.description: Make a clear PA announcement at the original gate informing passengers of the new gate number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a timely and clear announcement.

tasks.description: Move all gate equipment and staff to the new gate and update the airport's flight information display systems (FIDS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent coordinates the physical move and updates the public displays.
